item.title: Watch live: Fed Chair Jerome Powell speaks at Dealbook conference
item.description: The appearances comes two weeks ahead of when the central bank will announce is decision on interest rates.

item.title: Trump picks Peter Navarro as top trade advisor
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced that Peter Navarro will serve as "Senior Counselor for Trade and Manufacturing" in his next White House term.

item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson fatally shot in New York in targeted attack
item.description: Thompson, who led the largest private insurer in the U.S., was set to attend UnitedHealth Group's investor day, which the company canceled.

item.title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq rise to fresh record highs as tech shares jump: Live updates
item.description: Stocks rose Wednesday as Salesforce and Marvell Technology led tech shares higher on the back of strong quarterly earnings.

item.title: South Korean ruling party to oppose Yoon's impeachment
item.description: South Korea's parliament on Thursday formally introduced a motion to impeach Yoon Suk Yeol.
